collectionData.description: Microbial Conditions Ontology contains terms to describe growth conditions in microbiological experiments. The first version is based on gene regulation experiments in Escherichia coli K-12. It is being used in RegulonDB to link growth conditions to gene regulation data.
collectionData.name: RegulonMCO
collectionData.note:
__Development Notes__
Metadata changes:
-createdBy is no longer obo:createdBy is now x_1.1:contributor for ontology standardization, plus contributors are now separated one by one with their respective label.
-The description is no longer purl:MCO_0000382 is now x_1.1:description due to metadata compatibility issues.
-Added obo:IAO_0000116 as editor's notes.
-Added rdfs:label as ontology name.
-Added owl: versionInfo as version information.
Duplicate properties:
-MCO_0000190 (synonym) = oboI:hasExactSynonym
-MCO_0000382 (description) = x_1.1:description
-MCO_0000851 (definition) = obo:IAO_0000115
-definition = obo:IAO_0000115
By Felipe Betancourt F.
